It is packed with 1 GB of RAM and 16 GB of internal storage capacity, which can be expanded up to 1 TB with external storage. This stylish device has a 8 MP camera in the back and a 5 MP camera on the front side. It is powered by a standard battery of 3300 mAh.

name: Google Pixel 3 XL

Body.SIM: Nano-SIM card & eSIM- IP68 dust/water resistant (up to 1.5m for 30 mins)

Display.Protection: Corning Gorilla Glass 5- Always-on display- 100% DCI-P3 coverage- HDR

Platform.CPU: Octa-core (4x2.5 GHz Kryo 385 Gold & 4x1.6 GHz Kryo 385 Silver)

Main camera.Single: 12.2 MP, f/1.8, 28mm (wide), 1/2.55", 1.4µm, OIS, dual pixel PDAF

Selfie camera.Dual: 8 MP, f/1.8, 28mm (wide), PDAF 8 MP, f/2.2, 19mm (ultrawide), no AF

Sound.3.5mm jack: No - Active noise cancellation with dedicated mic - Type-C to 3.5 mm headphone jack adapter

Connectivity.WLAN: Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, dual-band, Wi-Fi Direct, DLNA, hotspot
Connectivity.GPS: Yes, with A-GPS, GLONASS, BDS, GALILEO

Features.Sensors: Fingerprint -(rear-mounted), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass, barometer
Features.Messaging: SMS(threaded view), MMS, Email, Push Email, IM

More.Color: Clearly White, Just Black, Not Pink
More.Other Features: Fast battery charging 9V/2A 18W QI wireless charging MP4/H.265 player MP3/WAV/eAAC+ player Photo/video editor Document editor

description: The price of the Google Pixel 3 XL is only BDT 23,000. Google Pixel 3 XL brings some great features Accelerometer, Fingerprint Sensor, Gear Sensor, Geomagnetic Sensor, Light Sensor, Proximity Sensor. It’s a 4G tech dual-SIM smartphone. Pixel 3 XL is available in Aurora Blue, Midnight Black and Coral Red colors. This is a 6.03-inch P-OLED display with 1440 × 2960 resolution. The camera has single cameras with 12.2 MP and 1.8 Apertures. The front has an 8 MP, 8 MP camera with Selfie Focus. It is powered by a 3430 mAh battery, which runs the Qualcomm SDM845 Snapdragon 845 processor and offers 4 GB of RAM and 64/128 GB of ROM for a smooth running.
